name: Money or Death - snake attack!
description:
Hey, do you like easy money? Try to take it away from a poisonous snake! Money or Death is a new popular application for those who like to tickle their nerves. Here you are to compete in speed of your reaction with the most dangerous poisonous snakes in the world! Try to take a few bucks away from Black Mamba, Green Tree Viper or Royal Cobra! For mystic and horror fans there is also Halloween Level in the game. Realistic locations, sudden attacks, cool soundtracks and, of course, deadly bites, so don't you dare to yawn! All these things are in store for you in the game. Victory or defeat, altruism or greed, money or death! You are to decide!

Features:

~ Doesn't require internet connection - play offline wherever and whenever you want
~ No in app purchases, the game is totally free
~ Perhaps, the best reaction trainer
~ There are lots of crispy banknotes in this money app
~ Perfect for competitions with friends at the party
~ A pile of fun and excitement
~ The most dangerous snakes of the world - in one game
~ Only in this game you can easily turn from a beggar into a money king
